title: Bug 5340 Cancelling add exception breakpoint has no effect
OB: When adding an exception breakpoint in the debug perspective, clicking cancel in the progress dialog does not have any effect. The exception breakpoint is still added.
EB: The progress dialog should close immediately and the exception breakpoint should not be added when cancel is clicked. Alternatively, the cancel button should be disabled when calling ProgressMonitorDialog.run with the 'cancellable' parameter set to false.
SR: 1) Go to the breakpoints pane in the debug perspective. 2) Click the J! button to add an exception breakpoint. 3) In the progress dialog, click cancel.
